summary: Every year, we audit the financial statements of the U.S. government. Ongoing weaknesses, including problems with the processes used to prepare the statements, prevent us from determining whether the financial statements fairly present the government's finances. During our FY 2020 audit, we did not make any new recommendations related to the processes for preparing the financial statements. However, there were 15 related recommendations from prior...
title: Management Report: Continued Improvements Needed in the Processes Used to Prepare the U.S. Consolidated Financial Statements
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
